snippet: Candy led all the way to win the $400,000 San Felipe Stakes for 3-year-olds by two lengths, upsetting the favorite Mor Spirit in a Kentucky Derby prep race at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif.
lead_paragraph: Candy led all the way to win the $400,000 San Felipe Stakes for 3-year-olds by two lengths, upsetting the favorite Mor Spirit in a Kentucky Derby prep race at Santa Anita in Arcadia, Calif.

headline.main: Danzing Candy Zips to Upset at San Felipe Stakes
